patthana15.8:1.1_0: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.8:2.1_0: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.8:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
